data.eml:eml: Gomphus kinzelbachi Schneider, 1984, in Iran: identification, habitat and behaviour (Odonata: Gomphidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schneider, Thomas, Ikemeyer, Dietmar, Ferreira, Sónia, Müller, Ole (2017): Gomphus kinzelbachi Schneider, 1984, in Iran: identification, habitat and behaviour (Odonata: Gomphidae). Zootaxa 4216 (6): 572-584, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.242456
